Title: Orchard SPA Theme (Single Page Application)

Orchard SPA Theme (single page application) 

 

Soon I found Orchard project and like its capabilities and how you are able to make new modules and themes and use it as a solid structure for a CMS.

Unfortunately the lack of a large community made ​​it difficult finding enough information framework itself. А lot of time looking for а theme that can be used for fashionable single page application.

This was my starting point - then use this great pjs.bootstrap theme as a base and here is result - Orchard single page application
